description:
Performed analysis regarding Asian equity markets to help in
         the development of trading strategies, including a major project
         focusing on flows in the Japanese market.

Wrote software for various automation tasks and long term
         infrastructure projects.

Rotated through the Special Situation Group, who deal with
         complex principal investments for the firm.

Ran workshops in Python as a demonstrator teaching Foundations
         of Computing.

Tutored Object Oriented Software Development in Java which
         involvedpreparing and running tutorials as well as marking
         assesment items.
Maintainance of internal tooling such as continuous integration.
Optimizing web facing and internal server configurations.

Implementation of linter rules to enforce consistent style across
        a large code base.
